"A.P.241/11/16": "Oh, hello."
"...Say, you've heard, haven't you? About Zeno and Echo getting married?"
"I wonder, have you been looking for someone like that too?"
"Ah, it's just, you and Matoi seem to be in a similar situation, but... I was just wondering, in general."
"Matoi would probably get upset if I asked her, so... Just generally speaking."
"Of course."
"What about you?"
"Yeah, I thought so. I'm not surprised you would."
"Me...? ...I wonder."
"...When I heard the news, it was like the two of them suddenly felt so distant."
"Two people joining together, it just feels like they're an an incredible distance away... But they're people I know."
"It's really... ...Ah, sorry."
"...I'm a little flustered."
"...I've thought about it, too. Ever since I was little, I've wondered what it would be like."
"But you see, I'm not very sociable. Nobody wants to be around people like me, so I can't imagine it ever happening."
"I've been blaming it on ARKS, because we do nothing but fight... That's what I've been telling myself..."
"Rather than being happy for them, I've been feeling jealous. ...Bet that sounds pretty selfish of me."
"That's not true."
"I actually feel the same way."
"Y-You don't think so? ...So I'm not the only one? That's kind of a relief."
"I gave them my blessing of course. It's a wonderful thing, and I owe the both of them so much."
"Besides... If I'm going to be jealous of them, then I'll just have to find someone good enough to make them jealous."
"...The chances of me finding someone like that are slim to none, though."
